files.patch:
@@ -106,4 +106,0 @@ -

A quick tip for development with Eclipse in general, which also -applies to indexing the Java sources in the JDK (see below), is to -enable dark mode before doing so. Trust us, it looks much better than -Eclipse's default look and feel. ;)

@@ -91,5 +91,0 @@
-A quick tip for development with Eclipse in general, which also applies to
-indexing the Java sources in the JDK (see below), is to enable dark mode
-before doing so. Trust us, it looks much better than Eclipse's default look
-and feel. ;)
-

@@ -40,2 +40,0 @@
-# Warning: This file does not have the best formatting!
-
@@ -269,1 +267,1 @@
-        $(X)    $(X)<entry flags="LOCAL" kind="includePath" name="$$(call FixPath, $$(src))"/>$$(NEWLINE))
+          $(X)    $(X)<entry flags="LOCAL" kind="includePath" name="$$(call FixPath, $$(src))"/>$$(NEWLINE))
